titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
OLDENBURGER 1939 1401 Hyde Park Blvd Mrs Rufus Chicago 1524 East 59th Street Chicago, Ill. 70 Armour Institute 3300 Federal St. Chicago, Ill. Feb. 14 sent cheque on a/c 900.00
Feb 14 ordered le Fleuve g cop. Finnegan's Wake
March 24 1 Fleuve 16 post 3 60
May 16 3 Finnigans Wake at 250v 750 sent off 1st copy post 13.30 39.90
809 50 June 9 " " 2nd " 13 3rd via Queen Mary Feb 14 credit 900 July 26 debit 809 50 90 50
July 26 Fraternity copy No 7 250 given to Still Centre, Spender 60 Mr Akeley goodbye to Berlin, Isherwood 75 Poems Lorca (to be sent from 75 London) July 26 postage 16 1285 50 less cheque 900 wrote enclosing statement July 26 bal. due 385.50
Nov 1 1939 wrote announcing $15 paid to Princeton a/c at 43.70 15 21850 credit 655,50 4370 less balance due July 26 - 385,50 655.50 and Nov 13 items 270 00 Nov 13 1939 4 Fleuve at post 16 frs 64 76 85 12 85 193.15 76 85 E O has credit 193.15
Dec 12 subscription Horizon 6 mos 6/6 60 wrote to ask if she consented 133.15 otherwise would pay myself SB
Dec 30 subscription (through A. Monnier) La Gazelle des Amis des Livres 46 paid A.M. Marie Claire 200 Jan 10.1940
April 29 sent statement total spent 1662 35 total paid 1555 50 balance due 106.85
1937 Oldenburger, Mrs. E. Hotel de l'Univers N. 63 rue rue le Prince Dec 20 Jude the Obscure Dec 22 24 Three Plays Dos Passos Jan. 16 24 After Such Pleasures Jan 7 Feb. 25 Fountain Febr. 28 28 Sparkenbroke Life Jan 31 " Febr 7. 28. New Yorker Febr 5 " Febr 12 Esquire March Febr. 28 Mr. Norris Changes Trains March 2 28 Best Mystery Stories. Mar. 16 28 Fabian Essays. Mar 16 28 Encyclopedia Britannica vol 9 March 2 Mar. 16 Education of Hyman Kaplan Mar 25 2 fr. per day Apr 23 Sally Bowles Apr 25 " 23 Dusty Answer Apr. 25 " 25 Summer Moonshine April 28 May 6 Dubliners May 24 May 24 Portrait of Artist as a Young Man May 30 May 27 Exiles June 2 June 3 Trial of a Judge June 9 " 9 Lady Chatterley June 11 June 20 Story of My Heart July 4 " 20 Richard Jefferies Life + Ideals July 4 " 21 Daring Young Man on the Flying June 24 Trapeze Sept 27 Orphan Island Oct 2 Oct 29 Kipps -- " " To the Lighthouse --
- Well of Loneliness - - Sons and Lovers - - Passage to India - - Unfinished Cathedral - - The Man Who Knew Was Thursday - - George Sand - Maria Howe - - Seven Against Reeves - - Mussolini's Roman Empire - - Murder In the Cathedral -
